EmailTemplate.description: Use to notify customer that their requested warranty registration was processed.
EmailTemplate.name: Warranty Registration Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Warranty Registration CASE-{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Your warranty registration for the item(s) below has been successfully processed.
P/N
S/N
Thank you.
BendixKing Warranty Team
Check your warranty status online at myaerospace.com.
Learn how on the Dealer Portal at bendixking.com.
Register your parts or make a claim on the dealer portal at bendixking.com.
